__e: I didn't tell him that his mother threatened to kill me.
He also said he'd kill me if I told anyone.
First because I felt sorry for her, I suppose. And then because she threatened to tell my husband about us.
Doesn't mean I'm threatened by him.
I mean, she'd be threatened by any woman who can give me what she can't.
I don't feel threatened by you, if that's what you mean.
Last time you spoke to Zoe, you shoved a knife in her ear, so I think she'll be disinclined to chat.
He threatened her with a pistol and she died of fright.
He even threatened his wife with a knife.
Uh, I-I don't know, she pulled a gun on me, took my key card.
But I never threatened her, and it was not my idea to suppress anything.
And did she threaten you and tell you to never see him again?
